name: Form Factor
description: react web app that utilizes redux to track your achievements relating to macronutrients, micronutrients, and workout details to provide a chart showing both in tandem with each other over the span of a week.

name: ShifTradr
description: full CRUD web application that allows employees to post and trade liability of work shifts in a streamlined fashion. Along with trading of shifts, users can message each other to speak about shift and trade details, with real-time updates.

name: FitNesse Format
description: NPM package to format a string the same as the FitNesse client would.

name: Card Shuffling
description: A simple web application to deal cards to players.
